title: Conference Finals Preview & Ayton's Future With The Suns | WHAT’S BURNIN | Showtime Basketball
itunes:title: Conference Finals Preview & Ayton's Future With The Suns | WHAT’S BURNIN | Showtime Basketball
description:
The NBA Conference Finals kick-off tonight and the guys got you covered with an in-depth breakdown of the series. Plus, they discuss the Sun's stunning loss and react to the DeAndre Ayton situation.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
